column1: The Pit Room////Due to the limited time I had in Houston
column2: I did some research ahead of time to see which BBQ house is worth paying a visit.  The Pit Room came up in several articles I read so The Pit Room it is.  Without a car
column3: I relied on getting there by Lyft.  Upon arrival at noon
column4: the place is already crowded and I was the last one in line inside the door and the customers behind me started lining up outside the door.
